imdb.plot outline: Meatless Manhattan is a lifestyle show covering the best of vegetarian/vegan/vegan raw dining in New York City. Whether you yourself are vegetarian, vegan, vegan raw, know someone who is, or simply want to switch it up and eat healthy now and then, we've got you covered on Meatless Manhattan!
imdb.title: Meatless Manhattan
plot: _Meatless Manhattan_ (qv) is a lifestyle show covering the best of vegetarian/vegan/vegan raw dining in New York City. Whether you yourself are vegetarian, vegan, vegan raw, know someone who is, or simply want to switch it up and eat healthy now and then, we've got you covered on _Meatless Manhattan_ (qv)!::Monica Bassi
